channel.title: entrepeneurship on Alexander Saavedra
channel.description: Recent content in entrepeneurship on Alexander Saavedra

item.title: Critize by Creating
item.description: Copernicus by Stanislaw Szukalski “The moment he [Galileo] was set at liberty, he looked up to the sky and down to the ground, and, stamping with his foot, in a contemplative mood, said, Eppur si muove, that is, still it moves, meaning the Earth.” ~ Giuseppe Baretti retelling 1757 To create is human, to consume is only tiny part of it. Somewhere along the way we started being referred to as consumers.

item.title: Pumpkin Spice Lattes
item.description: Pumpkin spice is considered a very basic drink. It would be considered a non-contrarian thing to drink. Yet I rarely see men my age drinking pumpkin spice lattes and they both shun and avoid drinking pumpkin spice to avoid seeming…whatever. I would wager the amount of people who actually freely would drink pumpkin spice lattes would increase if it was not a taboo or made fun of. Since 2005 I have used…the spice.
